product_desc: Carma is simple. People have given enough of their time to the car business and now it is time for the business to give back to its consumers. Give back the countless wasted hours at dealerships, sitting in the finance signing paperwork or hearing the same sales pitch about why you need a LoJack system. Or how about the car salesman’s classic: “Let me go talk to my manager.” Carma allows you to buy on your time, from your home! Browse our site for your next car. When you’ve decided, simply input your pre-approval information or apply for financing on the site, add gap insurance or extended warranties, and let us deliver your new car to your front door! Carma’s 10 day no questions asked guarantee on your new car means peace of mind. Want to sell your current car? We’ll take care of that too! Just input the info and we’ll give you a quote without the back and forth of a traditional dealer. We’ll even pick it up from you! It’s time to add cars to the e-commerce world and save you time!
name: Carma
